content: पवन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Clean, pure. --नः [ पूल्यु] {@--1@} Air, wind; सर्पाः पिबंति पवन न च दुर्बलास्ते <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; पवनपदवी, पवनसुतः &c. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--3@} A householder's sacred fire. --नं {@--1@} Purification. {@--2@} Winnowing. {@--3@} A sieve, strainer. {@--4@} Water. {@--5@} A potter's kiln ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} also). --नी A broom.
